Perform arterial puncture.sentence: The healthcare provider prepares the necessary tools for the arterial puncture.
Perform arterial puncture.subject: The healthcare provider
Perform arterial puncture.tools: disinfectant, gloves, sterile needle, syringe, and bandage

Perform arterial puncture.sentence: The healthcare provider cleans the puncture site using an antiseptic solution.
Perform arterial puncture.subject: The healthcare provider

Perform arterial puncture.sentence: The healthcare provider palpates the artery to locate the optimal puncture site.
Perform arterial puncture.subject: The healthcare provider

Perform arterial puncture.sentence: The healthcare provider inserts the sterile needle into the artery at the identified site.
Perform arterial puncture.subject: The healthcare provider

Perform arterial puncture.sentence: The healthcare provider applies pressure to the puncture site and secures a bandage after withdrawing the needle.
Perform arterial puncture.subject: The healthcare provider
